title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Amendment of Definition of Face 
Covering) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (amendment definition face covering) regulation 2020

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 244 of 2020) is amended by the substitution of the following 
definition for the definition of “face covering”: 

“ ‘face covering’ means a covering of any type which when worn by a person 
covers, without leaving a visible gap, the person’s nose and mouth;”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 3 health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (face covering public transport) regulation 2020 (s.i no 244 2020) amended substitution following definition definition face covering face covering mean covering type worn person cover without leaving visible gap person nose mouth

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary
text_raw:
4. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) is amended by the substitution of the 
following definition for the definition of “face covering”: 

“ ‘face covering’ means a covering of any type which when worn by a person 
covers, without leaving a visible gap, the person’s nose and mouth;”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [651] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 5. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary
text_raw:
5. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Small Public Service Vehicles and 
Certain Premises) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 569 of 2020) is amended by the 
substitution of the following definition for the definition of “face covering”: 

“ ‘face covering’ means a covering of any type which when worn by a person 
covers, without leaving a visible gap, the person’s nose and mouth;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [651]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings on Public Transport) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 244 of 2020), the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) and the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
– Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Small Public Service 
Vehicles and Certain Premises) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 569 of 2020) to 
provide for an updated definition of a face covering. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [651] 5
